name: isArray
description: Returns true if value is an Object. Note that JavaScript arrays and functions are objects, while (normal) strings and numbers are not.

name: isObject
description: Returns true if value is an Object. Note that JavaScript arrays and functions are objects, while (normal) strings and numbers are not.

name: isString
description: Returns true if object is a String.
